name: parallel for
short_description: A data parallel scientific programming model. Compiles efficiently to different platforms like distributed memory (MPI), shared memory multi-processor (pthreads), Cell BE processor, Nvidia Cuda, SIMD vectorization (SSE, Altivec), and sequential C++ code.
